name: Chocolate Chia Energy Bar
preparation: Blend first seven ingredients in a food processor.
Melt nut butter and honey in microwave, drizzle over mixture in food processor.
Pulse mixture until all ingredients are blended.
Divide mixture evenly between sections in a Perfect Petites. Press in lightly. Refrigerate until firm.
Flip petites onto a Sheet Pan and twist to pop out energy bars.
tips: Chia seeds are high in Omega-3 fatty acids and Calcium.

products.name: Cinnamon (Ground)
summary: A simple blend of organic cinnamon that brings the flavour. Great for baking, desserts, egg nog, or enhancing the taste of Middle Eastern and Indian dishes.

products.name: Apple Pie Spice
summary: Move over pumpkin spice; it's time for Apple Pie Spice to shine! Perfect for leveling up the taste of fall-inspired baking, it's also great on top of oatmeal, in a frothy late or smoothie – or anywhere you want a punch of apple pie flavour.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Perfect Petites
summary: No more cutting. No more waste. Use this cookware item to create 30 individual, perfect portions—both sweet & savoury.
